content: only - chain 4 and turn atrc flo in next 18 21 sts adc flo in next 12 14 sts row 22 m/l size only - chain 3 & turn adc flo in next 14 sts atrc flo in next 21 sts xs/s size cut yarn fold in half with atrc and adc lined up and joining yarn for size xs/s slip_stitch first 7 8 atrc from each row together slip_stitch along one side skipping next 11 13 sts slip_stitch all 12 14 adc together do not cut yarn repeat lace edging section see above finishing weave in ends wash and block as needed pattern and photos © tiffany haworth joy of life
